Invocation Name: sleep story
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Sleep Story is the Alexa skill that offers soothing bedtime stories designed to help you relax and drift effortlessly into a peaceful sleep. With over 10 unique stories and a variety of calming voices paired with tranquil background sounds, this skill is perfect for creating a comforting and restful bedtime routine.

⭐ PREMIUM FEATURES ⭐

• Captivating bedtime stories narrated by professional, soothing voices
• A selection of ambient background sounds for ultimate relaxation
• Unlimited access to the entire story library with no restrictions
• Regularly updated content to keep your bedtime routine fresh
• Full access to all story durations

We value your feedback to ensure we continuously improve and deliver the ultimate bedtime storytelling experience.

💫 Enjoy your journey to serene and restful nights! 💫
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
